verbs.description: DALLAS ( AP ) — [ARGM-TMP: Months after the horror of the Parkland school shootings in Florida] , [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: stood] [ARG2: before cheering members of the National Rifle Association] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday]
DALLAS ( AP ) — Months after the horror of the Parkland school shootings in Florida , President Donald Trump stood before [V: cheering] [ARG0: members] of the National Rifle Association on Friday
